hero.title: Mine
hero.subtitle: Rent enterprise-grade GPUs to mine cryptocurrency on our network with clear billing and predictable operations. For operators and pools who care about node stability, transparent payment terms, and scaling without surprises.

panel.description: Statuses are visible in one place, risks are highlighted in advance, and payment/renewal terms and responsibilities are fixed upfront.

features.title: Mining infrastructure that reduces your risk
features.subtitle: We handle the infrastructure so you can focus on earning. Clear pricing, predictable operations, and accountable uptime.

items.title: Understand the economics fast
items.description: Clear packages and pricing upfront. Know exactly what you're paying for before you commit.

items.title: Reduce risk before paying
items.description: Confirm quote and availability before payment. No surprises after you sign.

items.title: Launch without surprises
items.description: Predictable path to go-live. We handle provisioning end-to-end within days.

items.title: Operate with clarity
items.description: Visible statuses and updates in one place. Know what's happening with your nodes at all times.

items.title: GPU Services SLA
items.description: Accountable uptime with compensation if breached. Your infrastructure reliability is our responsibility.

items.title: Scale when needed
items.description: Add capacity under the same rules. Volume discounts available from 10+ servers.

forWho.title: Built for serious operators
forWho.subtitle: Whether you're running a large-scale operation or managing pools, we've built the infrastructure to match your needs.

howItWorks.title: From request to mining in 7 steps
howItWorks.subtitle: We handle the infrastructure while you focus on earning tokens. Month-to-month contracts with no long-term commitment.

steps.title: Submit Request
steps.description: Choose your GPU model, preferred region, and contract duration. We'll check availability and prepare your quote.

steps.title: Complete KYC
steps.description: After KYC verification is done. We provide a clear checklist of required documentation to streamline the process.

steps.title: Review Quote
steps.description: Confirm availability and fit before committing. Review your configuration and pricing details.

steps.title: Sign & Pay
steps.description: Sign a 1-month contract and pay for the first month upfront. Payment is required before server assignment.

steps.title: Provisioning
steps.description: We handle server assignment, software installation, and wallet connection. Provisioning completes within days.

steps.title: Operate & Monitor
steps.description: Your GPUs start mining. We provide 24/7 infrastructure monitoring and respond to any issues automatically.

steps.title: Billing & Renewal
steps.description: Monthly invoices at calendar month end. Renew by paying no later than 10 days before contract end. Downtime credits applied automatically.

howItWorks.note: Infrastructure downtime credits apply to infrastructure issues only and do not cover missed network rewards.

serviceAddon.sectionTitle: Let us manage the technical work
serviceAddon.title: Managed service add-on

items.title: No manual bring-up
items.description: we handle OS + RAID, drivers, and initial tuning.

items.title: No "setup guesswork"
items.description: we deploy your stack as instructed.

items.title: No blind spots
items.description: we monitor infrastructure signals 24/7 (node connectivity, GPU utilization & temperature).

items.title: Clear support channel
items.description: business hours support (CET) with updates and next steps.

items.title: Downtime credits
items.description: available under the managed service add-on (infrastructure downtime only).

serviceAddon.note: Note: monitoring/health scope should match the actually available tooling.

managedServices.title: We handle the technical complexity
managedServices.subtitle: Focus on earning while we manage the infrastructure. Our team takes care of everything from setup to maintenance.

services.title: Storage Setup
services.description: RAID arrays for databases and AI models

services.title: Model Deployment
services.description: AI models deployed and updated automatically

services.title: Updates & Patches
services.description: New Gonka versions, patches, and hotfixes applied automatically

pricing.title: Choose your 8x GPU server package
pricing.subtitle: All packages include managed infrastructure, 24/7 monitoring, and month-to-month contracts. No setup fees or long-term commitment.
pricing.volumeDiscountNote: from 10+ servers. Contact us for custom pricing.

efficiency.title: Compare GPU efficiency
efficiency.subtitle: Higher efficiency means more weight per dollar spent. Choose the GPU that maximizes your return.
efficiency.formulaHint: Higher efficiency = more weight per dollar spent
efficiency.disclaimer: Weights are based on current network data and may vary. Efficiency calculations use listed hourly rates.

items.question: What is mining as a service?
items.answer: We provision and manage enterprise-grade GPU servers for you. You pay in fiat and earn GNK tokens while we handle all infrastructure â€” from capacity check and allocation to go-live.

items.question: How long does provisioning take?
items.answer: Provisioning typically completes within days after KYC verification and contract signing. We handle server assignment, software installation, and wallet connection end-to-end.

items.question: How does billing work?
items.answer: Payment for the first month is required before server assignment. Monthly invoices are issued at calendar month end. Renew by paying no later than 10 days before contract end.

items.question: Can I scale my mining operation?
items.answer: Yes. Upgrade is available anytime (subject to capacity). Downgrade is available once per month. Volume discounts are available from 10+ servers.

items.question: What support do you provide?
items.answer: We offer 24/7 infrastructure monitoring with business hours support (CET timezone) for infrastructure issues. Network software updates are applied within 24 hours of release.

items.question: What happens if there's downtime?
items.answer: Infrastructure-caused downtime receives credits applied to your next payment or refunded. Note: credits apply to infrastructure downtime only and do not cover missed network rewards.

items.question: What makes Gonka tokens special?
items.answer: GNK is designed for AI inference workloads in the Gonka network. Rewards are aligned with real compute supply and demand, making it a sustainable token economy.

brand.name: Mine
brand.description: Professional GPU mining infrastructure for the Gonka network. Earn GNK tokens with enterprise-grade hosting and monitoring.
